mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (identification, password, name, email, phone_number, nickname, birthday, gender, introducing_message, profil_image_name,profil_image_original_name, profil_image_size) values(#{identification},#{password},#{name},#{email},#{phoneNumber},#{nickname},#{birthday},#{gender},#{introducingMessage},#{profilImageName},#{profilImageOriginalName},#{profilImageSize})
mapper.select: select id, identification, password, name, email, phone_number, nickname, birthday, gender, introducing_message, status, created_date, updated_date, `role`, profil_image_name, profil_image_original_name, profil_image_size from tbl_user where identification = #{userIdentification} and password = #{userPassword}
select identification, password, name, email, phone_number, nickname, birthday, gender, introducing_message, status, created_date, updated_date, role from tbl_user where id = #{adminId}

select id, identification, password, name, email, phone_number, nickname, birthday, gender, introducing_message, status, created_date, updated_date, `role`, profil_image_name, profil_image_original_name, profil_image_size from tbl_user order by id desc

select count(id) from tbl_user
and name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and nickname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT id, identification, password, name, email, phone_number, nickname, birthday, gender, introducing_message, status, created_date, updated_date, `role`, profil_image_name, profil_image_original_name, profil_image_size FROM tbl_user
and name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and nickname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by id desc limit #{offset},#{rowCount};
